events.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

translatedEntityProperties.theText: An old supply crate.

events.eventText:
Jabba’s criminal network is vast, reaching all the way to Ord Mantell. There, one of his agents meets you at a seedy cantina, You buy her a drink, and she leads you out the back to a landspeeder.

A short distance away she stops behind a warehouse, fumbles with an obviously stolen datapad, and leads you inside. 

Crates of food marked with the Imperial crest are stacked, ready for shipment. The smuggler cracks one open, saying, “Get in. You don't have long." You begin to protest when you hear a stormtrooper outside. “This is the one. Shipment for the munitions depot.” You jump into the crates, and your guide disappears out the back just as the lights come on.

It's a bumpy ride in the crates, but it soon ends.

eventActions.tbText:
"Rations shipment for the depot, sir."

“Right on time. l'll just have to inspect-"

You burst from the crates, weapons blazing, as the Imperials scramble for cover.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} Doors are locked to Imperials.
{-} When a hero withdraws, he is incapacitated instead. When activating, he receives only 1 action and can only use that action to perform a move. 
{-} The mission will progress when the door to the outpost opens.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Doors are locked to Imperials.
{-} When a hero withdraws, he is incapacitated instead. When activating, he receives only 1 action and can only use that action to perform a move. 
{-} The mission will progress when the door to the outpost opens.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText:
Bolts whiz dangerously close to your now explosive-laden satchels as you hop into the escape JumpMaster. Below, the Imperials frantically take stock of their emptied depot.

Upon your return, Gamorreans carry the weapons to a pourstone outbuilding before escorting you to the throne room. 

Jabba expels a cloud of smoke laughing while you recount the raid. Salacious B. Crumb interrupts throughout, which also seems to please the Hutt. For now, the truce holds.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 200 credits per hero.
{-} Discard all remaining active Story Mission cards. Place Story Mission cards "Trophy Hunting" and "Turf War" into play.

Unprepared for the Imperial reinforcements, you abandon the explosives. You risk Jabba’s wrath, but you won't be able to aid your friends while locked in an Imperial cell, either.

Salacious B. Crumb mocks you while you explain your failure. This makes Jabba chuckle, which seems to ease his mood. You will have another opportunity to prove your value.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.
{-} Discard all remaining active Story Mission cards. Place Story Mission cards "Trophy Hunting" and "Turf War" into play.

You pick up the explosive and store it in your satchel.

{-} You may test {J}. If successful, you gain 1 movement point.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
One of the charges Jabba wants is stored here, ready for the taking.

{-} A hero on or adjacent to an explosive can spend 2 movement points to claim that explosive. After he does, that hero may test {J} to gain 1 movement point.

events.eventText: The door to the Imperial outpost slides open. Directly in front of you, stationed at the top of a stairwell, are two Weequay mercenaries, outfitted with Imperial arms.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
A simple door leads into the outpost.

{-} The door is locked to Imperials.

eventActions.repositionText: Block access to the explosives and the door.

eventActions.tbText: Below them, you glimpse armaments strewn about a converted gambling den. Among them lie a few of Jabba’s requested bombs.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
One of the charges Jabba wants is stored here, ready for the taking.

{-} A hero on or adjacent to an explosive can spend 2 movement points to claim that explosive. After he does, that hero may test {J} to gain 1 movement point.

These are the coordinates your pilot gave you for extraction.

{-} When the heroes have collectively claimed 6 explosives and all heroes are on the Extraction Zone, click "Heroes Depart" to end the mission.

eventActions.tbText:
{-} Neutral mission tokens represent explosives. A hero on or adjacent to an explosive can spend 2 movement points to claim that explosive. After he does, that hero may test {J} to gain 1 movement point.
{-} Once per activation, a hero may suffer 1 {C} and discard an explosive he has claimed to choose a space within 3 spaces and roll 1 red die. Each figure on or adjacent to the chosen space suffers {H} equal to the {H} results. The discarded explosive is no longer considered claimed.
{-} Incapacitated heroes cannot claim explosives.
{-} When the heroes have collectively claimed 6 explosives and all heroes are on the Extraction Zone (green highlight), click the Extraction Zone and select "Heroes Depart" to end the mission.
{-} The Rebels win when the heroes depart.

eventActions.shortText: Get the explosives to the Extraction Zone.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Doors are locked to Imperials.
{-} Neutral mission tokens represent explosives. A hero on or adjacent to an explosive can spend 2 movement points to claim that explosive. After he does, that hero may test {J} to gain 1 movement point.
{-} Once per activation, a hero may suffer 1 {C} and discard an explosive he has claimed to choose a space within 3 spaces and roll 1 red die. Each figure on or adjacent to the chosen space suffers {H} equal to the {H} results. The discarded explosive is no longer considered claimed.
{-} When a hero withdraws, he is incapacitated instead. When activating, he receives only 1 action and can only use that action to perform a move. Incapacitated heroes cannot claim explosives.
{-} When the heroes have collectively claimed 6 explosives and all heroes are on the Extraction Zone (green highlight), click the Extraction Zone and select "Heroes Depart" to end the mission.
{-} The Rebels win when the heroes depart.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText: Lined neatly on shelves in this reinforced room lies an assortment of Imperial weaponry.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
A sturdy transparisteel door leads into what looks like a small bunker.

{-} The door is locked to Imperials.

eventActions.tbText: A blaster burns the wall just beside your head as stormtroopers waiting in ambush open fire.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Neutral mission tokens represent explosives. A hero on or adjacent to an explosive can spend 2 movement points to claim that explosive. After he does, that hero may test {J} to gain 1 movement point.
{-} Once per activation, a hero may suffer 1 {C} and discard an explosive he has claimed to choose a space within 3 spaces and roll 1 red die. Each figure on or adjacent to the chosen space suffers {H} equal to the {H} results. The discarded explosive is no longer considered claimed.
{-} When a hero withdraws, he is incapacitated instead. When activating, he receives only 1 action and can only use that action to perform a move. Incapacitated heroes cannot claim explosives.
{-} When the heroes have collectively claimed 6 explosives and all heroes are on the Extraction Zone (green highlight), click the Extraction Zone and select "Heroes Depart" to end the mission.
{-} The Rebels win when the heroes depart.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText: Responding to the blaring alarms, a squad of stormtroopers returns from patrol. “Don't let the Rebels escape!"

eventActions.repositionText: Block access to the Extraction Zone.

events.eventText: The threat level of the next mission (and only the next mission) increases by 1. During the Rebel Upgrade stage, the Rebel players can decide to spend 50 credits per hero to prevent this.
Because the heroes have collectively claimed at least 6 explosives, the heroes receive 25 credits per hero.
